title: New York drafts health workers, builds makeshift morgue in fight against coronavirus - Global News
description: New York drafts health workers, builds makeshift morgue in fight against coronavirus Global News Deaths, hospitalizations up in stark sign of virus’ reach Toronto Star U.S. has most coronavirus cases in world, next wave aimed at Louisiana Montreal Gazette NYC…
content: Just days after New York leaders ordered people to stay home authorities mobilized to head off a potential public health disaster Wednesday with the city s emergence as the nation s biggest coronavirus hot spot a warning flare and perhaps a cautionary tal chars
